FileSender has been added.
item.description:
Send large files quickly and securely using REANNZ FileSender. https://www.reannz.co.nz/products-and-services/filesender/ This new module can be loaded with 
module load
        FileSender/2.49.0-foss-2023a

item.title: libsodium has been added.
item.description:
library for encryption, decryption, signatures, password hashing and more. https://doc.libsodium.org/ This new module can be loaded with 
module load
        libsodium/1.0.18

item.title: NextPolish2 has been added.
item.description:
a fast and efficient genome polishing tool for long-read assembly https://github.com/Nextomics/NextPolish2 This new module can be loaded with 
module load
        NextPolish2/0.2.1-foss-2023a

item.title: matlab-proxy has been added.
item.description:
Python package which enables you to launch MATLAB and access it from a web browser. https://github.com/mathworks/matlab-proxy This new module can be loaded with 
module load
        matlab-proxy/0.23.1-foss-2023a

item.title: BreakDancer has been removed.

BreakDancer has been removed and can no longer be accessed via

item.description: The default version of Dorado has changed from 0.3.2 to 0.3.2, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load Dorado. If you wish to continue using 0.3.2 in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load Dorado/0.3.2

item.title: AlphaFold3DB has been added.
item.description:
AlphaFold3 databases This new module can be loaded with

item.title: wannier90 has been added.
item.description:
Wannier90 is an open-source code for generating maximally-localized Wannier functions and using them to compute advanced electronic properties of materials with high efficiency and accuracy. https://wannier.org/ This new module can be loaded with 
module load wannier90/3.1.0-foss-2023a

item.title: Emu has been added.
item.description:
species-level taxonomic abundance for full-length 16S reads. https://gitlab.com/treangenlab/emu This new module can be loaded with 
module load Emu/3.5.0

item.title: Mmg has been added.
item.description:
Mmg is an open source software for simplicial remeshing. It provides 3 applications and 4 libraries: the mmg2d application and the libmmg2d library: adaptation and optimization of a two-dimensional triangulation and generation of a triangulation from a set of points or from given boundary edges the mmgs application and the libmmgs library: adaptation and optimization of a surface triangulation and isovalue discretization the mmg3d application and the libmmg3d library: adaptation and optimization of a tetrahedral mesh and implicit domain meshing the libmmg library gathering the libmmg2d, libmmgs and libmmg3d libraries. https://www.mmgtools.org/ This new module can be loaded with 
module load Mmg/5.7.2-foss-2023a

item.title: SLEPc has been added.
item.description:
SLEPc (Scalable Library for Eigenvalue Problem Computations) is a software library for the solution of large scale sparse eigenvalue problems on parallel computers. It is an extension of PETSc and can be used for either standard or generalized eigenproblems, with real or complex arithmetic. It can also be used for computing a partial SVD of a large, sparse, rectangular matrix, and to solve quadratic eigenvalue problems. https://slepc.upv.es This new module can be loaded with 
module load SLEPc/3.19.0-foss-2023a

item.description: The default version of HDF has changed from 4.2.15-GCCcore-9.2.0 to 4.2.16-intel-compilers-2022.0.2, this is the version that will be loaded when you run module load HDF. If you wish to continue using 4.2.15-GCCcore-9.2.0 in any of your scripts, make sure to change them to module load HDF/4.2.15-GCCcore-9.2.0

item.title: FreeFEM has been added.
item.description:
FreeFEM offers a fast interpolation algorithm and a language for the manipulation of data on multiple meshes. https://freefem.org This new module can be loaded with 
module load FreeFEM/4.15-foss-2023a
